title: Drawing, "The Rise of Rome: Head of a Man Facing Left, Cicero", 1930–32
description: The profile outline from forehead to chin is heavily drawn and thickly shadowed. Shadows also delineate the cheekbone, ear, and neck, while wavy lines depict the hair, thinning at the top. Cicero, in antique Roman style, appears on the left, ending just underneath the chin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Rise of Rome: Head of a Man Facing Left, Cicero", 1930–32.
1930–32. China marker. Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-22.
